title: A Forbbiden Finale
description: Thrown in at the deep-end when she gets a scholarship to an elite ballet Academy, Carly's only saving grace is her handsome personal tutor, Mr. Langley. Her ballet is below par, her classmates dislike her, and she can't compete with her only friend's political agenda. Even Mr. Langley dislikes her... at first. But as everything else goes downhill, their relationship blossoms into something passionate and intense. It's forbidden, but can they find a way to be together? A Forbidden Finale is a standalone student/teacher romance novel with a happily ever after and no cheating, intended for over eighteens only.
author: Georgette Gray
